verses.verse: My <S%G80>brothers,<s%> be not <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G1320>masters,<s%> <S%G1492>knowing<s%> that we shall <S%G2983>receive<s%> the <S%G3187>greater<s%> <S%G2917>condemnation.<s%>

For in <S%G4183>many<s%> things we <S%G4417>offend<s%> <S%G537>all.<s%> <S%G1487>If<s%> <S%G1536>any<s%> man <S%G4417>offend<s%> not in <S%G3056>word,<s%> the <S%G3778>same<s%> is a <S%G5046>perfect<s%> <S%G435>man,<s%> and <S%G1415>able<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> to <S%G5469>bridle<s%> the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G4983>body.<s%>

<S%G2400>Behold,<s%> we <S%G906>put<s%> <S%G5469>bits<s%> in the <S%G2462>horses'<s%> <S%G4750>mouths,<s%> that they may <S%G3982>obey<s%> us; and we <S%G3329>turn<s%> <S%G3329>about<s%> their <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G4983>body.<s%>

<S%G2400>Behold<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> the <S%G4143>ships,<s%> which though they be <S%G5082>so<s%> <S%G5082>great,<s%> and are <S%G1643>driven<s%> of <S%G4642>fierce<s%> <S%G417>winds,<s%> yet are they <S%G3329>turned<s%> <S%G3329>about<s%> with a <S%G1646>very<s%> <S%G1646>small<s%> <S%G4079>helm,<s%> <S%G3699>wherever<s%> <S%G302><s%> the <S%G2116>governor<s%> <S%G3730>wants.<s%> <S%G1014><s%>

<S%G2532>Even<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> the <S%G1100>tongue<s%> is a <S%G3398>little<s%> <S%G3196>member,<s%> and <S%G3166>boasts<s%> <S%G3166>great<s%> things. <S%G2400>Behold,<s%> <S%G2245>how<s%> <S%G2245>great<s%> a <S%G5208>matter<s%> a <S%G3641>little<s%> <S%G4442>fire<s%> <S%G381>kindles!<s%>

And the <S%G1100>tongue<s%> is a <S%G4442>fire,<s%> a <S%G2889>world<s%> of <S%G93>iniquity:<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> is the <S%G1100>tongue<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> our <S%G3196>members,<s%> that it <S%G4695>defiles<s%> the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G4983>body,<s%> and <S%G5394>sets<s%> on <S%G5394>fire<s%> the <S%G5164>course<s%> of <S%G1078>nature;<s%> and it is <S%G5394>set<s%> on <S%G5394>fire<s%> of <S%G1067>hell.<s%>

For <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G5449>kind<s%> of <S%G2342>beasts,<s%> and of <S%G4071>birds,<s%> and of <S%G2062>serpents,<s%> and of things in the <S%G1724>sea,<s%> is <S%G1150>tamed,<s%> and has been <S%G1150>tamed<s%> of <S%G5449>mankind<s%>

But the <S%G1100>tongue<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1150>tame;<s%> it is an <S%G183>unruly<s%> <S%G2556>evil,<s%> <S%G3324>full<s%> of <S%G2287>deadly<s%> <S%G2447>poison.<s%>

<S%G1722>Therewith<s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G2127>bless<s%> we <S%G2316>God,<s%> even the <S%G3962>Father;<s%> and <S%G1722>therewith<s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G2672>curse<s%> we <S%G444>men,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> are <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G3669>similitude<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

Out of the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G4750>mouth<s%> <S%G1831>proceeds<s%> <S%G2129>blessing<s%> and <S%G2671>cursing.<s%> My <S%G80>brothers,<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things <S%G5534>ought<s%> not <S%G3779>so<s%> to be.

<S%G1410>Can<s%> the <S%G4808>fig<s%> <S%G4808>tree,<s%> my <S%G80>brothers,<s%> <S%G4160>bear<s%> <S%G1636>olive<s%> <S%G1636>berries?<s%> <S%G2228>either<s%> a <S%G288>vine,<s%> <S%G4810>figs?<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> can <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G4077>fountain<s%> both <S%G4160>yield<s%> <S%G252>salt<s%> <S%G5204>water<s%> and <S%G1099>fresh.<s%>

<S%G5101>Who<s%> is a <S%G4680>wise<s%> man and <S%G1990>endued<s%> with <S%G1990>knowledge<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> you? let him <S%G1166>show<s%> out of a <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G391>conversation<s%> his <S%G2041>works<s%> with <S%G4240>meekness<s%> of <S%G4678>wisdom.<s%>

But <S%G1487>if<s%> you <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G4089>bitter<s%> <S%G2205>envying<s%> and <S%G2052>strife<s%> in <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2588>hearts,<s%> <S%G2620>glory<s%> not, and <S%G5574>lie<s%> not <S%G2596>against<s%> the <S%G225>truth.<s%>

But the <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> that is from <S%G509>above<s%> is <S%G4412>first<s%> <S%G53>pure,<s%> <S%G1899>then<s%> <S%G1516>peaceable,<s%> <S%G1933>gentle,<s%> and <S%G2138>easy<s%> to be <S%G2138>entreated,<s%> <S%G3324>full<s%> of <S%G1656>mercy<s%> and <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G2590>fruits,<s%> <S%G505>without<s%> <S%G87>partiality,<s%> and <S%G505>without<s%> <S%G505>hypocrisy.<s%>
And the <S%G2590>fruit<s%> of <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> is <S%G4687>sown<s%> in <S%G1515>peace<s%> of them that <S%G4160>make<s%> <S%G1515>peace.<s%>
